misc: Bags Miura irons and is rumoured to sleep with them.
biography: Miso, a formidable presence hailing from Hirsala Golf, is set to make his tenth appearance at the Hector Trophée in 2025. Known for his meticulous approach and unwavering dedication to the sport, Miso has become a respected figure among his peers.

Over the years, Miso has secured one victory at the Hector Trophée, showcasing his ability to perform under pressure and deliver exceptional results when it matters most. While the Victor Trophy has eluded him thus far, his consistent performance suggests that individual glory may yet be within his grasp.

Off the course, Miso is somewhat of an enigma. Rumours abound about his peculiar habits, most notably his purported attachment to his Miura irons – some even claim he sleeps with them. Whether these stories are true or mere exaggerations, they only add to the mystique surrounding this intriguing golfer.
